name: Black Mamba
description:
Black Mamba is a modern snake game. It's made with Unity. Animations, sound effects, customized arts and more have been used.

Controllers are WASD and keyboard arrows.

I made this game for the memory of Kobe Bryant. He is one of my life idols. Black mamba was his on field name and his mentality. So, I had to to use it in this project if I was going to be interested with a game like this.
